info.name: Gemini MDJ-900
info.author: Author: Peter Stein aka LinuxGamesTV aka BdMdesigN
info.description: Gemini MDJ-900 midi map through MIDI channels 0 - 3. Gemini button Lock will act as quantize. Gemini buttons "Time", "Text", "Track Search", "BPM Mode", "Auto Cue" are disabled in Mixxx, because there isn't any function for them in Mixxx. Slip mode is disabled while scratching.
